summary: This is an email chain between U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS) staff regarding a draft letter to the Office of the Chief Medical Examiner (OCME). The OCME requested that the letter and a prior letter be withheld from disclosure. The email indicates the letter was ready to be sent via C0B.

events.title: Drafting of Letter to OCME
events.description: US Attorney's Office staff correspond about finalizing a letter to the Office of the Chief Medical Examiner, with the OCME having requested that this letter and a prior one be withheld from disclosure.

keyFacts: The document is an internal email from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York dated September 9, 2019.
The subject is a draft letter to the Office of the Chief Medical Examiner (OCME).
The OCME requested that this letter and a prior letter be withheld from disclosure.
The email indicates the letter was planned to be sent via 'C0B' (likely a secure delivery method).
No specific individuals are named; all parties are referred to by office designations (e.g., USANYS).
